reference_image_path_and_text_pairs: A front view portrait of The Wolf.
A front view portrait of Direwolf.
text_prompt:
Create an image following the given description: 
EXT. FROZEN NORTHERN FOREST - DAY. A chaotic, hand-held medium shot. Forest floor is covered in snow and ice. In the foreground, a savage-looking warrior wearing barbarian furs and wielding a colossal, rustic battle axe is mid-swing in a wide, savage arc. The warrior should reference Image 0, specifically his appearance and axe. Beside him, a massive, snarling Direwolf stands ready. The Direwolf should reference Image 3.
